00009 EagleInstance* EagleInstance_New(int totalWorkers)
00010 {
00011     EagleInstance *instance = (EagleInstance*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleInstance_New.1", sizeof(EagleInstance));
00012     if(NULL == instance) {
00013         return NULL;
00014     }
00015     
00016     instance->workers = EagleWorkers_New(totalWorkers, instance);
00017     instance->nextJobLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00018     instance->plan = NULL;
00019     
00020     return instance;
00021 }
00022 
00023 void EagleInstance_run(EagleInstance *eagle)
00024 {
00025     /* start workers */
00026     EagleWorkers_start(eagle->workers);
00027     
00028     /* close workers */
00029     EagleWorkers_joinAll(eagle->workers);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void EagleInstance_addPlan(EagleInstance *eagle, EaglePlan *plan)
00033 {
00034     eagle->plan = plan;
00035 }
00036 
00037 void EagleInstance_nextJob_(EaglePlan *plan, EaglePlanJob **job, int coreId)
00038 {
00039     EagleLinkedList_Foreach((*job)->plan->providers, EaglePlanBufferProvider*, provider)
00040     {
00041         if(EaglePageProvider_pagesRemaining(provider->value.provider.provider) == 0) {
00042             EaglePlanJob_Delete(*job);
00043             *job = NULL;
00044             break;
00045         }
00046         
00047         if(provider->destinationBuffer >= plan->buffersNeeded) {
00048             char msg[1024];
00049             sprintf(msg, "destination %d is greater than allowed %d buffers!\n", provider->destinationBuffer, plan->buffersNeeded);
00050             EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverityError, msg);
00051             
00052             EaglePlanJob_Delete(*job);
00053             *job = NULL;
00054             break;
00055         }
00056         EaglePage_Delete((*job)->buffers[provider->destinationBuffer]);
00057         (*job)->buffers[provider->destinationBuffer] = EaglePageProvider_nextPage(provider->value.provider.provider);
00058     }
00059     EagleLinkedList_ForeachEnd
00060 }
00061

00102 
00103 void EagleInstance_Delete(EagleInstance *eagle)
00104 {
00105     if(NULL == eagle) {
00106         return;
00107     }
00108     
00109     EagleWorkers_Delete(eagle->workers);
00110     EagleLock_Delete(eagle->nextJobLock);
00111     EagleMemory_Free(eagle);
00112 }
